page.title: 20ADULT'S VIEW OF THORPE END
page.content: My name is Susan and I asked my mother what she thought about living in Thorpe End. There are not many shops in the area so my mum goes by car to a {supermarket}near Norwich.There is only a green for children to play on, so my mum thinks there should be more {leisure facilities.}Behind our house is a building site where more modernized houses are being built. I asked my mum what she thought about them and she said, "They are making a good job of them,but I prefer the old thatched houses".Out of the three shops in Thorpe End, which are the Post Office,Salon and Garage, my mum uses the garage the most for petrol.My mum likes living where she does because it is{peaceful,}yet within easy reach of the city of Norwich.
